explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses the use of machine learning classifiers to forecast box-office success.
explanations.supervised learning: The study uses supervised learning techniques to classify and predict movie success.
explanations.classification: The paper focuses on classifying the success of movies using various machine learning methods.
explanations.support vector machine: The paper mentions the use of support vector machine as one of the classifiers in the system.
explanations.SVM: SVM is explicitly mentioned as one of the machine learning classifiers used in the study.
explanations.decision tree: The paper refers to a decision support system, which likely involves decision tree algorithms.
explanations.feature learning: The study proposes new features and uses feature selection to improve forecasting accuracy.
explanations.feature representation: The paper discusses the representation of features such as director and cast performance to predict movie success.
